trait.name: Orc Hunter
entries: Ruiniel has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks to track Orcs and Goblinoids, and on Intelligence ({@skill Nature}) checks to recall information about any of the forces of Sauron.

trait.name: Fey Ancestry
entries: Ruiniel has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed}, and magic can't put her to sleep.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: Ruiniel has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

trait.name: War Archery
entries: A longbow deals one extra die of its damage when Ruiniel hits with it (included in the attack). In addition, when Ruiniel makes a ranged attack with a longbow, it doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll from being within 5 feet of a hostile creature, though it may still have disadvantage from other sources.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ruiniel makes two Shortsword attacks or two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. Instead of dealing damage, Ruiniel can pin part of the target's clothing or body to the ground or to a nearby wall or tree. If it does so, the target is {@condition restrained}. A creature, including the target, can take its action to remove the arrow and free the {@condition restrained} target by succeeding on a {@dc 14} Strength check.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Cogrick is a 7th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 15}, {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). He can cast the following sorcerer spells.

trait.name: Aura of Reality Warping
entries: A creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of Cogrick takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage as its mind is addled with rippling psychic energy.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Cogrick can take the {@action Disengage} or {@action Hide} action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

action.name: Mind Sliver
entries: Cogrick telepathically links minds with a creature within 60 feet of it that knows at least one language. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage and incur disadvantage on the next saving throw it makes before the end of Cogrick's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pirate makes three attacks, using Scimitar or Pistol in any combination.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atkr m} {@hit 9}, reach 5 ft. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) Slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) Poison damage, and the target suffers one of the following effects of the pirate's choice:

items.name: Awestruck
entries: The target has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

items.name: Poison
entries: The target has the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

action.name: Pistol
entries: {@atkr r} {@hit 10}, range 30/90 ft. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) Piercing damage.

bonus.name: Rally (1/Day)
entries: The pirate chooses up to three other creatures it can see within 30 feet. Until the start of the pirate's next turn, the targets have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls and saving throws.

reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: {@actTrigger} The pirate takes damage. {@actResponse} The pirate reduces the damage by half, rounded down.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If the pirate is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the pirate instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Ace is a 5th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). He regains his expended spell slots when he finishes a short or long rest. He knows the following warlock spells.

trait.name: Sealed Blade
entries: Ace’s true form is that of a devil posessing a sword. When a creature picks up the sword, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Charisma saving throw or die. Ace will then take control of the body, taking on the Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma of Ace but retaining it’s other stats and hit points.
Ace can use his bonus action to teleport its weapon into a free hand, or a bonus action to temporarily dismiss the weapon into a pocket dimension.
If Ace drops to 0 hit points, his spirit leaves his body and returns to the sword. While in this state, Ace is {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the ace's darkvision.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hexblade wielder makes three attacks with its bonded weapon.

action.name: Sealed blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage. On a crit, the wielder rolls damage dice three times, instead of twice. If a creature is reduced to 0 hit points by this weapon, it dies; its body is destroyed, its soul is absorbed by Ace, and Ace’s current body gains 54 ({@dice 12d6}) temporary hit points. Someone killed this way cannot be resurrected unless Ace’s Nabassu form is killed within 24 hours, or through the use of the Wish spell or similar magic.

action.name: Reform (Only if 20+ hit points)
entries: Ace’s body and blade combust in a fiery explosion. Each creature within 20ft must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 8d6} fire damage, or half as much on a successful save. Ace’s body is reduced to ashes, and his blade disappears to a pocket dimension. A Nabassu appears in the same space where his body was, with the same Intelligence, Wisdom and Charisma scores as Ace. This is Ace in his original form, which will return to his home plane automatically after 24 hours, or when it is reduced to 0 hit points.
